Function reference

Search Codesets

Medical Coding & Billing Codesets.

describe_hcpcs()
Describe HCPCS Codes
assign_adjustments()
Assign Adjustment Codes
search_adjustments()
Search Adjustment Codes
search_anesthesia()
search_anesthesia
search_aocs()
NCCI Add-On Code Edits
search_denials()
Search Denial Types
search_gpcis()
Geographic Practice Cost Indices (GPCIs)
search_hcpcs()
Level II HCPCS Codes
search_modifiers()
Level I and II HCPCS Modifiers
search_mues()
NCCI Medically Unlikely Edits (MUEs)
search_opps()
Outpatient Prospective Payment System (OPPS) Capitations
search_payment()
Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amount File
search_pos()
Place of Service (POS) Codes
search_ptps()
NCCI Procedure to Procedure (PTP) Edits
search_rbcs()
Search Restructured BETOS Classifications
search_rvus()
Get HCPCS Codes with RVUs

Functions to calculate various metrics.

Calculate Limiting Charge

Calculate Non-Participating Fee
calculate_amounts()
Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts

Validation Checks

Functions to validate inputs.

is_category_I()
Check if code is HCPCS Level 1 Category I (CPT)
is_category_II()
Check if code is CPT Category II Performance Measurement Codes (F codes)
is_category_III()
Check if code is CPT Category III Temporary Codes (T codes)
is_level_I()
Check if code is HCPCS Level I
is_level_II()
Check if code is HCPCS Level II
is_valid_length()
Check if string is valid length of a HCPCS code
